{"id":609914470,"lang":"java","time":"1 month, 4 weeks","timestamp":1640888266,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"33 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/609914470/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Contiguous Array","memory":"99.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int findMaxLength(int[] nums) {\n        int count = 0, maxLen = 0;\n        Map<Integer, Integer> counts = new HashMap<>();\n        counts.put(0, -1);\n        \n        for (int i = 0; i < nums.length; i++) {\n            count = count + (nums[i] == 1 ? 1 : -1);\n            if (counts.containsKey(count)) {\n                maxLen = Math.max(maxLen, i - counts.get(count));\n            } else {\n                counts.put(count, i);\n            }\n        }\n        return maxLen;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"contiguous-array"}
